1.0.name: wordpress/feedblitz-feedsmart
1.0.description: FeedBlitz is the premium FeedBurner alternative - see http://kb.feedblitz.com/article/AA-00444 - and this plugin is a drop in replacement for FeedBurner's FeedSmith plugin. Use this plugin as you migrate your FeedBurner - see http://kb.feedblitz.com/article/AA-00477 - or regular WordPress feeds to FeedBlitz to capture all feed traffic and track subscriber statistics.
